int key; int model; //int len;//å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ while(1) { cout<<"Model:"<<endl; cout<<"1:Encry"<<endl; cout<<"2:Decry"<<endl; cin>>model; if(model==1) { cout<<"Please enter the content to be encrypted:"; cin>>C; //len=strlen(C);//é”™è¯¯:Céœ€è¦è½¬æ¢ä¸ºchar*ç±»å‹ cout<<"Please enter key :"; cin>>key; Encryption(C,key,model); } else if(model==2) { cout<<"Please enter the content to be decrypted:"; cin>>C; cout<<"Please enter key :"; cin>>key; Decryption(C,key,model); } else cout<<"Error!"<<endl; } return 0;} void Encryption(string C,int key,int model){ if(model==1) { for(int i=0;i<C.length();i++) { if(C[i]>='A'&&C[i]<='Z') C[i]='A'+(C[i]-'A'+key)%26; else if(C[i]>='a'&&C[i]<='z') C[i]='a'+(C[i]-'a'+key)%26; } cout<<"The result of the encryption isï¼š"<<C<<endl; } else cout<<"Errorï¼"<<endl; } void Decryption(string M,int key,int model){ if(model==2) { for(int i = 0; i <M.length(); i++) { if(M[i] >= 'A' && M[i] <= 'Z') M[i] = 'A'+(M[i]-'A'-key+26)%26;//M[i]='A'+(M[i]-'A'+(26-key)) else if(M[i] >= 'a' && M[i] <= 'z') M[i] = 'a'+(M[i]-'a'-key+26)%26;//... } cout<<"The result of the decryption is:"<<M<<endl; } else cout<<"Errorï¼"<<endl; } å®Œæ•´ç‰ˆï¼ˆå°±æ˜¯ç©·ä¸¾äº†keyï¼‰ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;void Encryption(string C,int key,int mode);//åŠ å¯†å‡½æ•°void Decryption(string M,int key,int mode);//è§£å¯†å‡½æ•°int main(){ string C; int key;//åç§»ä½ int mode; //int len;//å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ while(1) { cout<<"Mode:(Please enter selection modeï¼ï¼ï¼)"<<endl; cout<<"1:Encry"<<endl; cout<<"2:Decry"<<endl; cout<<"3:Keyless Decryption"<<endl; cin>>mode; if(mode==1) { cout<<"Please enter the content to be encrypted:"; cin>>C; //len=strlen(C);//é”™è¯¯:Céœ€è¦è½¬æ¢ä¸ºchar*ç±»å‹ cout<<"Please enter key :"; cin>>key; Encryption(C,key,mode); } else if(mode==2) { cout<<"Please enter the content to be decrypted:"; cin>>C; cout<<"Please enter key :"; cin>>key; Decryption(C,key,mode); } else if(mode==3) { cout<<"Please enter the content to be decrypted:"; cin>>C; for(int k=1;k<26;k++) Decryption(C,k,mode); } else cout<<"Error!"<<endl; } return 0;} void Encryption(string C,int key,int mode){ //if(mode==1) //{ for(int i=0;i<C.length();i++) { if(C[i]>='A'&&C[i]<='Z') C[i]='A'+(C[i]-'A'+key)%26; else if(C[i]>='a'&&C[i]<='z') C[i]='a'+(C[i]-'a'+key)%26; } cout<<"The result of the encryption isï¼š"<<C<<endl; //} //else //cout<<"Errorï¼"<<endl; } void Decryption(string M,int key,int mode){ //if(mode==2) //{ for(int i = 0; i <M.length(); i++) { if(M[i] >= 'A' && M[i] <= 'Z') M[i] = 'A'+(M[i]-'A'-key+26)%26;//M[i]='A'+(M[i]-'A'+(26-key)) else if(M[i] >= 'a' && M[i] <= 'z') M[i] = 'a'+(M[i]-'a'-key+26)%26;//... } cout<<"The result of the decryption is:"<<M<<endl; cout<<endl; //} // else // cout<<"Errorï¼"<<endl; } #å‡¯æ’’å¯†ç Python 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758#Encryptiondef Encryption(C,key,mode): C_list=list(C) C_list_encry=C_list i=0 while i<len(C_list ): if(ord(C_list[i])>=65 and ord(C_list[i])<=90): C_list_encry[i]=chr(65+(ord(C_list[i])-65+key)%26) if (ord(C_list[i])>=97 and ord(C_list[i]) <= 122): C_list_encry[i] = chr(97+ (ord(C_list[i]) - 97 + key) % 26) i+=1 print("The result of the encryption isï¼š"+"".join(C_list_encry ))#Decryptiondef Decryption(C,key,mode): C_list = list(C) C_list_decry = C_list i = 0 while i < len(C_list): if (ord(C_list[i]) >= 65 and ord(C_list[i]) <= 90): C_list_decry[i] = chr(65 + (ord(C_list[i])-65-key+26) % 26) if (ord(C_list[i]) >= 97 and ord(C_list[i]) <= 122): C_list_decry[i] = chr(97 + (ord(C_list[i]) - 97-key+26) % 26) i+=1 print("The result of the decryption is:"+"".join(C_list_decry))#main()def main(): while(1): print("Mode:(Please select modeï¼ï¼ï¼)") print("1:Encry") print("2:Decry") print("3:Keyless Decryption") mode=input () if mode=="1": print("Please enter the content to be encrypted:") C=input() print("Please enter key:") key = int(input()) key=key%26 Encryption(C, key, mode) if mode=="2": print("Please enter the content to be decrypted:") C=input() print("Please enter key :") key=int(input()) key = key % 26 Decryption(C, key, mode) if mode=="3": print("Please enter the content to be decrypted:") C=input() key=1 while key<26: Decryption(C, key, mode) key+=1 if mode!="1"and mode!="2" and mode!="3": print("Error!")if __name__ == '__main__': main()

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
